title: Require content before submitting branch for review
description:
## Problem
Currently, a branch can be submitted for review even if it has no content. This leads to reviewers being assigned to empty branches, wasting their time and creating confusion.

## Solution
Add validation when submitting a branch for review to ensure at least one content item exists in the branch.

## Implementation
1. Add a validation guard in the workflow transition for SUBMIT_FOR_REVIEW
2. Check if the branch has any content using contentService.listByBranch()
3. Return a clear error message if no content exists: "Cannot submit for review: branch has no content"
4. Update the frontend to show this validation error appropriately

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Backend rejects SUBMIT_FOR_REVIEW transition if branch has no content
- [ ] Clear error message is returned to the client
- [ ] Frontend displays the error to the user
- [ ] Existing branches with content can still be submitted normally
